name: Arc-en-ciel Adventure
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand if you control an Earth Warrior monster. If this card is Summoned: You can return 1 "Dream Prism" you control to the hand; draw 1 card, then discard 1 "Arc-en-ciel" or "Dream Prism" card. You can only Special Summon 1 "Arc-en-ciel Adventure" once per turn.
